snippet.title: Flicky Longplay (Arcade) [QHD]
snippet.description:
Game Info
---------------------------------------------------
Developer: Sega
Publisher: Sega
Year of Release: 1984

Game Review & Impressions
---------------------------------------------------
One of Sega's earliest mascots, Flicky is probably best known from featuring in the Sonic the Hedgehog series, but his roots are here in this particular coin-op.

The objective of the game is to round up the you chicks on each level and get to the exit door before the bad cats can catch you. Chicks follow you in a long procession, and can get scattered around, should a cat come into contact with them.

Overall, Flicky is a pretty cool arcade game for the era. It's simple to pick up, but tough to master, and still remains pretty fun today.

Video Notes
---------------------------------------------------
- Game has no ending. I play through all available levels before it loops back to level 1.

Related Longplays & Videos
---------------------------------------------------

Chapters
---------------------------------------------------
